local_intent: Perceive white_plate, compute rim grasp, approach-and-align, execute Pick, verify grasp stability.
assumptions: Gripper is open prior to grasp attempt
White plate is within reachable workspace and visible
coherence_with_global: Implements the 'grasp' phase from GLOBAL_BT and GLOBAL_DESCRIPTION: DetectObject -> ComputeGraspPose(strategy=pinch) -> ApproachAndAlign(tolerance=0.005) -> Pick -> IsGraspStable, using the same bb key 'grasp_white' and matching timeout/tolerance bins.
